> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/nilearn/nilearn/pull/1429?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [87c12ef...dc991f8](https://codecov.io/gh/nilearn/nilearn/pull/1429?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

In ```doc/building_blocks/manual_pipeline.rst```, we should change name ```dataset``` to ```haxby_dataset``` to be in consistent with the example ```examples/plot_decoding_tutorial.py``` we are pointing to. Sample code is a bit of mix of both names dataset and haxby_dataset.

Also, section "6.1.1.3. Masking the data: from 4D image to 2D array" should be moved to above "6.1.1.2. Loading non image data: experiment description". The reason is in between we have conditioning applied to the masked dataset (fmri_masked) restricting to face vs cat labels which is done before masking. This might confuse users if they have followed the code snippets. 

Any thoughts on this ? ping @GaelVaroquaux @bthirion
Close PR after comment from @GaelVaroquaux in PR #1432
the Warning does not make sense regarding the code in the documentation
